relation: KSystemLog, a Log Viewer Tool. Move from kde-apps

pageTitle: Difference between revisions of "Schedules/KDE4/4.1 Feature Plan" - KDE TechBase
textBeforeTable: [edit] kdelibs 21 kdewebdev 20 kdevplatform 19 kdevelop 18 kdeutils 17 kdetoys 16 kdesdk 15 kdepim 14 kdenetwork 13 kdemultimedia 12 kdegraphics 11 kdegames 10 kdeedu 9 kdebindings 8 kdeartwork 7 kdeadmin 6 kdeaccessibility 5 kdebase-runtime 4 kdebase-workspace 3 kdebase-apps 2 kdepimlibs 1 kdelibs Contents done => completed in-progress => started, but not completed yet todo => not started yet Legend: Please ensure that any entries you have on this page are kept up to date with respect to their status (todo, in-progress or done). Any features which are not mentioned on this page must be rescheduled for 4.2 and added to the list at Schedules/KDE4/4.2 Feature
textAfterTable: DONE kdeui Goya, a framework for inserting controls into itemviews in a really easy and fast way Rafael Fernández López <ereslibre@kde.org> DONE kdeui Make icon naming spec compliant 3rd party icon themes like Tango or gnome-icon-theme work correctly. Jakob Petsovits <jpetso@gmx.at> DONE kdeui Rich textedit widget supporting most rich text features. [mailto: steveire@gmail.com Stephen Kelly < steveire@gmail.com >] DONE KFile Implement fd.o desktop-bookmark-spec for KFilePlacesModel Norbert Frese <nf2@scheinwelt.at> DONE KHTML Efficient smooth scrolling Germain Garand <germain@ebooksfrance.org> DONE KHTML prospective loading of other network resources while waiting for arrival of blocking scripts Germain Garand <germain@ebooksfrance.org>
